boardgame.description: The storyline in Friedemann Friese's Fearsome Floors (aka, Finstere Flure) continues the FFF-saga from Friese's earlier game, with players trying to escape from F_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;rst Fieso. Story aside, what we have is a wonderful race game in which the players must move through a dungeon as quickly as possible _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; or at least within 14 turns _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; before it crumbles over their heads._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players could reach the exit in only seven turns if everything were peaceful and quiet, but unfortunately the dungeon is also the home of a very hungry monster! Each round, players take turns moving one disk at a time, flipping over the disk after moving it to reveal the movement points available for the next round. They can try to lead the monster, who is always after fresh prey, to opponents' pieces, but they may find themselves eaten instead! Pieces can slide along blood slicks or might be crushed between a boulder and a wall. You can even try to get the monster to teleport to another part of the board, where it will fall upon its next victim!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2004 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee

The game is in very good condition and has all the components. I can combine orders to cut down on shipping costs, and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m willing to barter if you purchase multiple items. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H via UPS - $9.00
Still in shrink and shipping from inside the US!

The box has a few dings, and I feel obligated to list it as good as a result, but for the most part they are only noticeable if one actually goes out of the way to notice. There is a small dent on one edge, a bit of wrinkling on the box label that was there when I bought it (a small manufacturing error? Again, the label on that spot is not actually cracked or whitened, just wrinkled) and there is some light whitening on the corners. Components all present and accounted for, I played this game a bit, tired of it, and then shelved it. Shipping is 7$ within the US, international orders are welcome as well, but shipping obviously will go up in price.

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be recieved within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.5% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games customerservice@chumchumgames.com

Rio Grande Games (RIO 245) Type: Race, reprint scheduled Number of players: 2 - 7 Age of players: 10+ Length: 60 minutes Game Description: It was fabulous! Fearlessly, you found the 3 fetishes in the Finnish fjord. With light-footed and foxy feints you ferry the fetishes to prince Fieso in France to free the fascinating faerie Fabula. But Fieso is not fond of foreigners, what a fiasco! You land freezing and foolishly find yourself trapped in a frightful fortress with sinister corridors. Now you must flee Fiesos trap. Furunkulus, the monster, is a frightening freak, especially fond of foolish foreigners. He will feed on you if he is able. So you want to fool Furunkulus and flee to freedom. Author: Friedemann Friese

Finstere Flure (2F) - GERMAN Edition - Condition/Zustand: new, unused and sealed / neu, unbenutzt und in Folie verpackt General Information: I sell this item as a private seller. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an. Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten. Sollten Maengel vorhanden sein, werden diese auch in der Beschreibung unter _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Condition/Zustand_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; erwaehnt.
